thread.section_title: MyComicShop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyComicShop | mycomicshop.com
thread.title: Joseph

author: Joseph
title: Joseph
text: I've been shopping with MyComicShop for quite some time now and I am a frequent customer due to my high satisfaction with the orders I've placed on a regular basis. They have the very fairest prices, widest variety of back issues, most accurate grading, nicest customer service, safest packaging techniques, and absolute fastest delivery you will EVER find out there. NOBODY beats these guys! My very highest recommendations and accolades!
